snippet: At least 43 deaths were reported in Monday’s assaults, which were led by the Nusra Front, and at least 15 Syrian soldiers were said to have been captured.
abstract: Two important Syrian military bases fall to insurgents led by Nusra Front, militant group aligned with Al Qaeda; rebels have been sieging bases in Idlib Province for two years.
lead_paragraph: At least 43 deaths were reported in Monday’s assaults, which were led by the Nusra Front, and at least 15 Syrian soldiers were said to have been captured.

headline.main: 2 Military Bases in Syria Fall to Rebels
headline.print_headline: 2 Military Bases in Syria Fall to Rebels
